description.value: At 20th level, you can see perfectly in natural or magical darkness. When you use @Compendium[pf1.spells.ed7fvzc2p4m6n7a2]{Shadow Conjuration} or @Compendium[pf1.spells.2q48ogrz3840xwi7]{Shadow Evocation} spells, your creations are 20% more real, and any creatures you create gain the benefits of the @Compendium[pf1.feats.7bJjKqNRrvpXJ4L3]{Augment Summoning} feat.
